p: The EE% of the prepared nanoemulsions was investigated to determine the amount of loratadine and sulpiride loaded in the internal phase (oily phase) of these formulations and the results are displayed in Table 2. The EE% of the prepared nanoemulsions for both drugs exhibited high values more than 90% with insignificant differences between different formulations ( p > .05). F3 displayed the highest values for loratadine (97.5 ± 0.00) and sulpiride (98 ± 0.1).
